title: p2ptrader.pro
author: p2ptrader.pro
content: Dear dealers on the p2p market and everyone who'd like to become one, we are excited to announce the public release of P2PTrader.Pro. ‚≠ê The platform has been in development with private clients for the past two years and now we are ready to welcome more people!What is P2PTrader.Pro?It's the only "all-in-one" trading software that automates and simplifies everything p2p-trading related from quick ads creation and auto-setting fees (your ads will be on top) to payouts and accounting. It handles the whole process of trades and messages processing; when you trade with P2PTrader.Pro, everything is accessible from a single user-friendly app! ‚úÖ Just take a look at the quick start video to understand what we are talking about:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KvKOJlhF_2c&t=194sP2PTrader.Pro is safe. All your API keys are encrypted and stored on your device only. Unlike the bots, all the requests are sent from your IP, so you won't be blocked, etc. because of someone else! üü¢ Besides taking care of your ads positions, the software has many advanced customizable features like KYC, automatic messaging in various languages, quick replies, bank and payment system accounts management, risk-free trading (preventing losses when crypto rates move), etc, etc. And the best thing is that it's super-easy to use!At the moment the software supports the following P2P marketplaces: LocalBitcoins, Binance, Paxful, Bitzlato, LocalCoinSwap... ‚≠ê and we'll be glad to add any other ones as per our customers' requests!How to start using P2PTrader.Pro?All you need is an email and a computer that can run Windows 10. You can start enjoying the service FOR FREE spending just a few minutes! Just follow the simple instructions:https://p2ptrader.pro/quick_start/‚òùYou have a week to test the software without paying a single satoshi; after that please choose any of the plans. To celebrate the launch, we have set promotional prices for a limited time. Don't miss out on the opportunity to take advantage of these discounted rates, as they are likely to increase after a certain period of time:‚úÖ right now you can use P2PTrader.Pro to control an unlimited number of advertisements in all possible fiat- and crypto-currencies starting from $44 per month!With P2PTrader.Pro you won't need any other software, or bots, whatsoever; neither you'll need to log into your accounts at the exchanges ‚úå It's the only solution dealers like you need: try it once and you'll see! All the dealers who already use P2PTrader.Pro are extremely satisfied, we are confident that it will exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you among our happy customers!CONTACTS:TG ‚≠ê @p2ptrader_procontact@p2ptrader.prohttps://p2ptrader.pro

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: I haven't tested the software for obvious reasons. You know how malware is a big problem when it comes to things involving money, especially crypto.1. According to your announcement, you didn't list so good p2p marketplaces like bisq, hodlhodl. Any plans to include them in your platform?2. I only see a windows application, are you going to make apps for the MacOS and Linux versions? How about mobile apps?

comments.author: p2ptrader.pro
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on January 25, 2023, 10:40:16 PMI haven't tested the software for obvious reasons. You know how malware is a big problem when it comes to things involving money, especially crypto.1. According to your announcement, you didn't list so good p2p marketplaces like bisq, hodlhodl. Any plans to include them in your platform?2. I only see a windows application, are you going to make apps for the MacOS and Linux versions? How about mobile apps?Thanks for your comments!1. Sure. There's no problem to add any marketplace if it has API. We'll add all the exchanges our customers ask for, including those. The priority to add a marketplace depends on how often the clients ask to add one.2. I believe it should work on MacOs and Linux. We just never tested it yet, hence just wrote about Windows¬†  All the current users work on Windows; if it turns out that say MacOs is requested and it doesn't work, we'll fix this. P2PTrader.Pro is Electron app based on Chromium so it's multi-platform by design.As for the worry about malware etc, I understand the concern. But honestly, even if malware would have no legal and other risks, it just makes no sense to spend time creating a fake app for such a limited market. I believe all the malware creators would prefer apps targeted for waaay wider audience.
